Module slogo_team01
Package view.selectorpane

Class BasicSelectorPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.selectorpane.BasicSelectorPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectorPane
    public class BasicSelectorPane
extends java.lang.Object
implements SelectorPane
    Implements SelectorPane, creates a pane that stores possible additional panes that users can show and hide. Uses a simplified version of the observer design pattern (where there is only one observer and so attaching and detaching of observers is not required), updates these observers whenever the user selects a pane from the selector pane to be shown or hidden.
    Author:
    Goh Khian Wei

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicSelectorPane

        public BasicSelectorPane​(SelectorPaneObserver observer)
        Constructor, stores the observer which has to know whenever the state of the selector pane changes (i.e. whenever a pane is chosen to hidden or shown) Visual design of selector pane set using css files.
        Parameters:
        observer - SelectorPaneObserver which has to know when state of selector pane is changed.

      • addPane

        public void addPane​(java.lang.String paneName)
        Initialises an element in the selection pane representing a new pane that can be shown or hidden. Buttons present in pane are completely initialised through a resource file (buttons.properties), additional buttons can be added through adding the necessary methods and modifying the resource file.
        Specified by:
        addPane in interface SelectorPane
        Parameters:
        paneName - Name of a pane to be added to the list of panes that can be selected from the selector pane.
